item.title: Kioptrix 3 - Write Up
item.description: Summary asdasd Netdiscover root@kali:~# netdiscover Currently scanning: 192.168.60.0/16 | Screen View: Unique Hosts 3 Captured ARP Req/Rep packets, from 3 hosts. Total size: 180 _____________________________________________________________________________ IP At MAC Address Count Len MAC Vendor / Hostname ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- 192.168.56.1 0a:00:27:00:00:04 1 60 Unknown vendor 192.168.56.11 08:00:27:5f:6f:ed 1 60 PCS Systemtechnik GmbH 192.168.56.12 08:00:27:40:1a:b5 1 60 PCS Systemtechnik GmbH Nmap root@kali:~/vulnhub/kioptrix3# nmap -sC -sV -oA nmap 192.168.56.12 Starting Nmap 7.70 ( https://nmap.

item.title: Kioptrix 2 - Write Up
item.description: Summary Easy machine, which is vulnerable to SQL injection, that gives the possibility to get a reverse shell. While on the machine, we can execute a kernel exploit, that gives us root privileges. Netdiscover root@kali:~# netdiscover Currently scanning: 192.168.81.0/16 | Screen View: Unique Hosts 4 Captured ARP Req/Rep packets, from 3 hosts. Total size: 240 _____________________________________________________________________________ IP At MAC Address Count Len MAC Vendor / Hostname ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- 192.168.56.13 08:00:27:07:11:52 2 120 PCS Systemtechnik GmbH 192.

item.title: Kioptrix 1 - Write Up
item.description: Summary Very easy machine which is vulnerable to remote code exeuction on samba. Maybe there are different ways too, but I haven’t tried out right now. Netdiscover root@kali:~# netdiscover Currently scanning: 192.168.116.0/16 | Screen View: Unique Hosts 6 Captured ARP Req/Rep packets, from 4 hosts. Total size: 360 _____________________________________________________________________________ IP At MAC Address Count Len MAC Vendor / Hostname ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- 192.168.56.1 0a:00:27:00:00:04 1 60 Unknown vendor 192.168.56.11 08:00:27:6d:28:27 2 120 PCS Systemtechnik GmbH 192.
